model.name: Louis Vuitton 2054 Heat Reactive Puffer
model.disambiguatingDescription: This high-tech piece reinvents the puffer jacket in heat- and water-sensitive recycled technical fabric. Tailored in a regular fit and featuring an all-over Monogram motif, it is signed with a 3D LV logo on the chest and a LV 2054 signature on the right sleeve. Details include attached neoprene mittens, a central zip, and zipped chest pockets.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• 100% Polyester
  • Anthracite
  • Regular Fit
  • Model wears a FR 50 size
  • Model measurements : chest 34’’ / 86 cm, height 6'2’’ / 188 cm
  • Made in Italy
